abstract: Google said it would spend hundreds of millions of dollars on renewable energy, part of that to hire engineers and experts to investigate alternative energies like solar and wind power.
snippet: Google said it would spend hundreds of millions of dollars on renewable energy, part of that to hire engineers and experts to investigate alternative energies like solar and wind power.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Nov. 27 — Google, the Internet company with a seemingly limitless source of revenue, plans to get into the business of finding limitless sources of energy.

headline.print_headline: A Subsidiary Charts Google’s Next Frontier: Renewable Energy

abstract: Google the Internet company with a seemingly limitless source of revenue, plans to get into the business of finding limitless sources of energy.
snippet: Google the Internet company with a seemingly limitless source of revenue, plans to get into the business of finding limitless sources of energy.
lead_paragraph: Google, the Internet company with a seemingly limitless source of revenue, plans to get into the business of finding limitless sources of energy.

abstract: Goldman Sachs‘ Lloyd C. Blankfein has lapped his rivals at other investment banks this year. But who knew he would outshine Warren E. Buffett, the legendary investor, and the three guys behind the Internet giant Google?
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs‘ Lloyd C. Blankfein has lapped his rivals at other investment banks this year. But who knew he would outshine Warren E. Buffett, the legendary investor, and the three guys behind the Internet giant Google?

headline.main: Blankfein Tops Buffett in Fortune’s Power List

abstract: A new feature to Google’s cellphone mapping service can figure out more or less sort of where you are. It’s got some slick technology to help it figure that out.
snippet: A new feature to Google’s cellphone mapping service can figure out more or less sort of where you are. It’s got some slick technology to help it figure that out.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE: See comment from Google at the end.

headline.main: Google Doesn’t Know Where You Are (But It Has a Good Guess)
